transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji very good afternoon sir Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se aapne 9696 par call kiya sir koi specific reason sir?
Customer: Reason yahi hai ki bhai koi kuch bhi matlab isme koi issue aa raha hai iska koi solution hoga ki nahi hoga aapne kaha ki aapke jo product line hai na kya aa raha hai itna matlab usse aur bolte aap
Executive: Nahi nahi aap bataiye na kya problem aa raha hai
Customer: Tu apne aap ko kya samajhti hai ye bata na mai tujhe do varsh se jhel raha hu matlab tu jyada padhi likhi hai kya normal baat kari ja rahi hai kya aap chilla rahe hai aapko kya problem aa rahi hai
Executive: Sir aap normal baat kariye aapko kya problem hai?
Customer: Ha faltu bakwas lagati hai jab dekho jab matlab tere se phone karta hu tere se jyada bewakoof hai koi matlab dekhta nahi duniya mein aaj kal kya hai hume pareshani ho rahi hai aapko kya problem hai
Executive: Sir aap shanti se bataiye aapko kya problem hai?
Customer: Nahi aapne kya solution karke diya do varsh se do varsh mein matlab jab tera marji aati hai ki tu jab 96 par call karte tab to tu call karte ho nahi waise to koi solution hai na tumne kaha product khilayenge ye bhai ye tumhara score hai wo badha do score bhi badha diya lead generate hoke kaha aa rahi hai kaha show kar rahe search kare inko ek ek mahine mein ek ek lead search ho rahi hai yaha jab search kar rahe hai aur ye
Executive: Last month aapne 58 buyleads consume kari hai sir
Customer: Last month aapne 58 buyleads consume kari hai aur aap keh rahe ho ki is month aapne saat buyleads abhi tak consume kar li hai
Executive: Sir is month aapne saat buyleads abhi tak consume kar li hai
Customer: Wo wo lead se unko lead bolte hai
Executive: Sir aap shanti se baat kariye sir pehle to aap aaram se baat kariye
Customer: Aaram se baat nahi hoti aaram se kyu kyu karu aaram se paise koi maine chatti kapde ke liye diya bhai
Executive: Sir ye aap kis tarike se baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Are ab ab suno ab maine subah ka score badhaya raat mein pure raat din mein score badhane mein laga diya ye to ek photo ka maine score badha diya ab bhi lead pure din mein dekh raha hu generate nahi aayi subah 7 baje ka dekh raha hu main kaha koi koi lead aayi hai isme mar
Executive: Aaj aapne aaj aapne koi lead consume nahi kari kya aaj aapne koi lead consume nahi kari
Executive: Aaj aapne koi lead consume nahi kari
Customer: Aaj koi lead consume nahi kari
Executive: Aaj aapne koi lead consume nahi kari
Customer: Haan to uthaya utna mere ko main tumhare samne
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with lead generation.

- Claims leads are invalid and not generating.

- Questions the effectiveness of IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive stated customer consumed 58 buyleads last month.

- Executive mentioned customer consumed 7 buyleads this month.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead quality
